name: Fantasy Writers’ Workshop
short_description: A hands-on workshop for aspiring fantasy authors led by bestselling writers.
long_description: Step into the realm of fantasy literature with this three-day intensive workshop, guided by some of the genre’s most celebrated authors. Learn the art of world-building, character development, and storytelling. Attendees will have the chance to refine their craft through personalized feedback and engage in thought-provoking group discussions. The workshop concludes with a networking session and a chance to pitch your manuscript to industry professionals.
return_policy_specifics: Cancellations made 7 days prior to the event will receive a 50% refund. No refunds for cancellations within 7 days.
